introduction.section1: Queensland is the second-largest state in Australia. Located on the east coast, with Brisbane as its capital and other well-known cities like Cairns and Townsville, you will discover a lot of things to do and see.
introduction.section2: A paradise for surfers, famous for the Great Barrier Reef, with a coastline full of sublime beaches, there are also endless plains or tropical rain forests. It is the perfect place to see koalas in their natural habitat.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Queensland
meta-description: Discover Queensland, the second-largest state in Australia. The great barrier reef, tropical forest, or meeting with koalas, through our articles we will show you different places to visit. For each place visited we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?
social-network-description: A paradise for surfers, famous for the Great Barrier Reef, with a coastline full of sublime beaches, there are also endless plains or tropical rain forests. It is the perfect place to see koalas in their natural habitat.
